actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to authorize the issuance of gold commemorative coins bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue gold commemorative coins bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the issuance of gold commemorative coins bearing the seal or symbol of the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration.
